meanings.definition: Items worn to cover the body.
meanings.sent1: I need new clothing for school.
meanings.sent2: She picked out her favorite clothing for the party.
meanings.sent3: The clothing in the store was so colorful!
meanings.sent4: His kindness was like warm clothing on a cold day.
meanings.sent5: The clothing on display caught everyone's attention.

meanings.sent1: My closet is full of stylish clothing.
meanings.sent2: The fashion show featured designer clothing.
meanings.sent3: The clothing on the mannequins looked like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like comforting clothing for his soul.
meanings.sent5: The clothing on the runway was breathtaking.
